entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
